questions.question: What is the purpose of HTML and CSS?
choices: HTML handles data, CSS handles routing
HTML tells the browser what to display, CSS tells it what style to display it in
HTML styles the page, CSS makes it interactive
HTML makes the page interactive, CSS styles the page
questions.correct_answer: HTML tells the browser what to display, CSS tells it what style to display it in

questions.question: Which of these HTML tags contains correct syntax?
Which of these HTML tags contains correct syntax?
What is the convention for variable naming in JavaScript?
What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
choices: == checks both variables have a value set, === checks if the two values are equal
== checks for the same value, === checks for the same value and same data type
== is used for numerical equality, === is used for strings and characters
questions.correct_answer: == checks for the same value, === checks for the same value and same data type
